boat.full_description: Caliph was built at Frazerburgh, date unknown but a guess has been made by her owner to be around 1905, and originally called Maggie. It is believed that she lay semi-derilict towards the end of World War 11. She was then sold to a Shetland owner, and first registered in Lerwick in 1948. She was sold in 1970, and then re-sold to her present owner. Extensively re-built and re-rigged as closely as possible to her original state as a Zulu Skiff. P. F. Arsons book, "Fishing, Boats and Fishing folk on the East Coast of Scotland" published about 1932 has an ilustration entitled , "An old lute Skiff at Burghead, Maggie". It is believed that this is the boat in its original form.
boat.name: Caliph
